Articles.Content:
Challenge  is to get  all over the  kerbol sistim  and  go outside the  sistim 

 

Rules  

 

 find  the  Easter eggs. 

Use rockets landers planes etc.

1.1 and  1.2 is alowed

Thread moved to the Challenges subforum. 

Please review this sub's guide to submissions.

No offence OP, but this isn't a 'challenge'. You need to provide something that can be numerically measured so that people can be ranked and compete for better solutions. You also need to provide an entry for yourself, with screenshots, so that there is an initial target to aim at.

"Visit the crashed UFO on Mun and return with the lightest possible craft, here's my N-ton solution <pictures>" would be a challenge
